name: mocker-api
description: This is dev support mock RESTful API.

scripts.doc: yarn workspace mocker-api typedoc src/index.ts src/delay.ts --name mocker-api --out docs/type
scripts.build: yarn workspace mocker-api tsbb build --disable-babel --file-names src/bin/mocker.ts --file-names src/delay.ts
scripts.watch: yarn workspace mocker-api tsbb watch --disable-babel --file-names src/bin/mocker.ts --file-names src/delay.ts

author: Kenny Wong <wowohoo@qq.com>
